mapper.insert: MERGE INTO MOVIE_CREW mc USING (SELECT #{personId} AS personId, #{movieId} AS movieId FROM DUAL) src ON (mc.personId = src.personId AND mc.movieId = src.movieId) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET mc.crewJob = #{crewJob} WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT (personId, movieId, crewJob) VALUES (#{personId}, #{movieId}, #{crewJob})
mapper.select: SELECT p.personId, p.personName, p.profilePath, mc.crewJob FROM MOVIE_CREW mc JOIN PERSON p ON mc.personId = p.personId WHERE mc.movieId = #{movieId} AND mc.crewJob = 'Director'
